name: Mongols Tower Rush
description: High aggression strategy. Uses [icon:outpost] Towers to deny enemy resources early. High risk, high reward.

steps.description: Immediately pack [icon:ger] Ger and [icon:town_center] Town Center. Move TC towards a wood line near the center.
Unpack [icon:town_center] TC near [icon:wood] wood and [icon:sheep] sheep. Unpack Ger on wood and send all 6 starting villagers to wood.
Send 1 [icon:villager] to build [icon:outpost] Outpost near enemy [icon:gold] gold. [icon:rally] Rally new villagers to [icon:food] sheep.
Build [icon:barracks] Barracks. Produce 2 [icon:spearman] Spearmen to protect the tower builder. [icon:rally] Rally to enemy gold.
[icon:attack] Garrison tower. Deny enemy gold. Build 2nd [icon:outpost] on wood line. Rally more to [icon:food] food.
[icon:feudal_age] Age up with Deer Stones! Place it near wood or food for movement speed buff. Use 3 builders.
